trans-unit.source: Used to track relationships between objects in the object context.
<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> is used to track relationships between objects in an object context.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> 用于跟踪对象上下文中对象之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: There is one instance of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> class for each relationship tracked in the object context.
trans-unit.target: 对于对象上下文中跟踪的每个关系，都有一个 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Relationships are defined by associations in a conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 通过概念模型中的关联定义关系。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity.
trans-unit.target: 此示例添加了新`SalesOrderHeader`实体到`Contact`实体。

trans-unit.source: Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays the relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它获取从所有相关的端`Contact`实体和将显示关系名称、 源角色名称和目标角色名称的每个相关端。

trans-unit.source: Reference to the entity that is calling this method.
Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager" /> object.
The requested <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager" />.
The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.Create%2A> method is used by objects that implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.Create%2A> 方法由实现 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships> 的对象使用。

trans-unit.source: When Object Services requests the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> property of an object that implements <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>, the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.Create%2A> method is called if the relationship manager does not already exist for the object.
trans-unit.target: 当对象服务请求实现了 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> 的对象的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships> 属性时，如果对象的关系管理器不存在，将调用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.Create%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumeration of all the related ends managed by the relationship manager.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of objects that implement <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" />.
An empty enumeration is returned when the relationships have not yet been populated.

The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.GetAllRelatedEnds%2A> method returns an enumeration of <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.GetAllRelatedEnds%2A>方法返回的枚举<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> are concrete types that derive from <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>是派生自的具体类型<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> abstract class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>抽象类将实现<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>接口。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity.
trans-unit.target: 此示例添加了新`SalesOrderHeader`实体到`Contact`实体。

trans-unit.source: Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end,
trans-unit.target: 然后，它获取从所有相关的端`Contact`实体和显示关系名称、 源角色名称和每个相关端的目标角色名称

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: Name of the relationship to navigate.
The relationship name is not namespace qualified.
Name of the target role for the navigation.
Indicates the direction of navigation across the relationship.
Gets an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> of related objects with the specified relationship name and target role name.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> of related objects.
Gets an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> of related objects that have the specified relationship name and target role name.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有指定关系名称和目标角色名称的相关对象的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: The relationship name should not be namespace qualified.
trans-unit.target: 关系名称不应由命名空间限定。

trans-unit.source: An error occurs when you prepend the namespace to the relationship name.
trans-unit.target: 如果将命名空间置于关系名称之前，将发生错误。

trans-unit.source: The specified role returned an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> instead of an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" />.
Name of the relationship in which <c>targetRoleName</c> is defined.
The relationship name is not namespace qualified.
Target role to use to retrieve the other end of <c>relationshipName</c>.

Returns either an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> or <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> of the correct type for the specified target role in a relationship.

<see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" /> representing the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> or <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> that was retrieved.
This method is intended to be used in scenarios where the user does not have full metadata, including the static type information for both ends of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 此方法旨在用于用户没有全部元数据的情况，包括关系两端的静态类型信息。

trans-unit.source: This metadata is specified in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmRelationshipAttribute> object on each entity type in the relationship, so the metadata system can retrieve it based on the supplied relationship name and target role name.
trans-unit.target: 这些元数据在关系中的每个实体类型上的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmRelationshipAttribute> 对象中指定，这样元数据系统可以根据提供的关系名称和目标角色名称进行检索。

trans-unit.source: The relationship name should not be namespace qualified.
trans-unit.target: 关系名称不应由命名空间限定。

trans-unit.source: An error occurs when you prepend the namespace to the relationship name.
trans-unit.target: 如果将命名空间置于关系名称之前，将发生错误。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="relationshipName" /> or <paramref name="targetRoleName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The source type does not match the type of the owner.
<paramref name="targetRoleName" /> is invalid.
-or-
Unable to find the relationship type in the metadata.
The type of the returned <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: Name of the relationship to navigate.
The relationship name is not namespace qualified.
Name of the target role for the navigation.
Indicates the direction of navigation across the relationship.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> for a related object by using the specified combination of relationship name and target role name.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> of a related object.
The relationship name should not be namespace qualified.
trans-unit.target: 关系名称不应由命名空间限定。

trans-unit.source: An error occurs when you prepend the namespace to the relationship name.
trans-unit.target: 如果将命名空间置于关系名称之前，将发生错误。

trans-unit.source: The specified role returned an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> instead of an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" />.
The type of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> being initialized.
trans-unit.target: 正在初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: The relationship name.
The role name of the related end.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> to initialize.
Initializes an existing <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> that was created by using the default constructor.

The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.InitializeRelatedCollection%2A> method initializes an existing <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> that was created by using the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.InitializeRelatedCollection%2A> 方法初始化使用默认构造函数创建的现有 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> is initialized by using the provided relationship and target role names.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用提供的关系和目标角色名称，初始化 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.InitializeRelatedCollection%2A> method is used during deserialization only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.InitializeRelatedCollection%2A> 方法仅在反序列化时使用。

trans-unit.source: When the provided <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> is already initialized.
-or-
When the relationship manager is already attached to an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" />.
-or-
When the relationship manager already contains a relationship with this name and target role.
The type of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> being initialized.
trans-unit.target: 正在初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: The relationship name.
The role name of the related end.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> to initialize.
Initializes an existing <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> that was created by using the default constructor.

The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.InitializeRelatedReference%2A> method initializes an existing <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> that was created by using the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.InitializeRelatedReference%2A> 方法初始化使用默认构造函数创建的现有 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> is initialized by using the provided relationship and target role names.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用提供的关系和目标角色名称，初始化 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.InitializeRelatedReference%2A> method is used during deserialization only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.InitializeRelatedReference%2A> 方法仅在反序列化时使用。

trans-unit.source: When the provided <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> is already initialized.
-or-
When the relationship manager is already attached to an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" />.
-or-
When the relationship manager already contains a relationship with this name and target role.
The serialized stream.
Used internally to deserialize entity objects along with the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager" /> instances.
Describes the source and destination of a given serialized stream, and provides an additional caller-defined context.
Called by Object Services to prepare an <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityKey" /> for binary serialization with a serialized relationship.
Serialization of relationships is only supported for binary serialization.
trans-unit.target: 关系的序列化仅支持用于二进制序列化。

trans-unit.source: Complete object graphs, including relationships, is not supported for Windows Communication Foundation and XML serialization.
trans-unit.target: 完整的对象图（包括关系）不支持用于 Windows Communication Foundation 和 XML 序列化。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Serializing Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/06c77f9b-5b2e-4c78-b3e3-8c148ba0ea99).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[序列化对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/06c77f9b-5b2e-4c78-b3e3-8c148ba0ea99)。
